text: Cheryl Hines (born September 21, 1965) is an American actress and television director. She is most noted for playing Cheryl in the HBO show Curb Your Enthusiasm. She was born in Miami Beach, Florida. Hines was nominated for two Emmy Awards. In 2014, she married Robert F. Kennedy Jr.. ==References== Category:Actors from Florida Category:People from Miami Beach, Florida Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:Movie directors from Florida
title: Cheryl Hines
